title: State Bicycle Co: 4130 All-Road Flat Bar
content: State Bicycle Co‘s 4130 All-Road bike just got a bit zippier with a new flat bar model. This new setup comes in the pictured pearl finish and a black frame model, can be sold with either 650b or 700c wheels, and a 1×11 drive train, all for $899.99. The new 4130 All-Road Flat Bar is in stock and shipping today from State Bicycle Co.
author: prolly
